answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[] args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int a=sc.nextInt(), b=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(a+b); }}
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[] args){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt();System.out.print(a>b?a:b);}}
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();System.out.print(n>0?"Positive":"Non-Positive");}}
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();System.out.print(n%2==0?"YES":"NO");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt();int m=a;if(b>m)m=b;if(c>m)m=c;System.out.print(m);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int s=sc.nextInt();System.out.print(s>=60?"PASS":"FAIL");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int y=sc.nextInt();boolean ok=(y%400==0)||(y%4==0&&y%100!=0);System.out.print(ok?"YES":"NO");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt();boolean ok=a+b>c&&a+c>b&&b+c>a;System.out.print(ok?"YES":"NO");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int s=sc.nextInt();if(s>=90)System.out.print("A");else if(s>=80)System.out.print("B");else if(s>=70)System.out.print("C");else if(s>=60)System.out.print("D");else System.out.print("E");}}

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();if(n>0)System.out.print("Positive");else if(n==0)System.out.print("Zero");else System.out.print("Negative");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();String[] w={"","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"};System.out.print(w[n]);}}

problems.title: é›»è²»è¨ˆç®—ï¼ˆåˆ†æ®µè²»ç‡ï¼‰
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥åº¦æ•¸ kWhï¼š<=100 æ¯åº¦ 5 å…ƒï¼›101~200 æ¯åº¦ 7 å…ƒï¼›>200 æ¯åº¦ 10 å…ƒã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[] args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int kwh=sc.nextInt(); int fee; if(kwh<=100){ fee=kwh*5; } else if(kwh<=200){ fee=100*5+(kwh-100)*7; } else { fee=100*5+100*7+(kwh-200)*10; } System.out.print(fee); }}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);double h=sc.nextDouble(),w=sc.nextDouble();double bmi=w/(h*h);if(bmi<18.5)System.out.print("Under");else if(bmi<24)System.out.print("Normal");else System.out.print("Over");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt();String op=sc.next();int b=sc.nextInt();switch(op){case "+":System.out.print(a+b);break;case "-":System.out.print(a-b);break;case "*":System.out.print(a*b);break;case "/":System.out.print(a/b);break;} }}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt();if(x==0||y==0)System.out.print("Axis");else if(x>0&&y>0)System.out.print(1);else if(x<0&&y>0)System.out.print(2);else if(x<0&&y<0)System.out.print(3);else System.out.print(4);}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt();int[] arr={a,b,c};Arrays.sort(arr);System.out.print(arr[0]+" "+arr[1]+" "+arr[2]);}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();if(n<12)System.out.print("Child");else if(n<18)System.out.print("Teen");else if(n<65)System.out.print("Adult");else System.out.print("Senior");}}

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();if(n>=12)System.out.print("Strong");else if(n>=8)System.out.print("Medium");else System.out.print("Weak");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int p=sc.nextInt();double r=p>=3000?0.8:p>=2000?0.85:p>=1000?0.9:1;System.out.print((int)(p*r));}}
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]x){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt();System.out.print((b-a==c-b)?"YES":"NO");}}
